Package nio2.ssl

The package ni2.ssl contains the classes that implement the functionality of class SSLAsynchronousSocketChannel. This is an asynchronous socket channel that adds a layer for SSL/TLS processing to the jdk class java.nio.channels.AsynchronousSocketChannel. The API of the package's public classes is decribed below in Javadoc. The package contains futhermore the following package-local helper classes:
Lists channels and their descriptions
Name Type Description
Action enum Enumerates the actions that can be processed during a SSL/TLS communication
BufferState class Stores information on the state of a java.nio.Buffer
Context class Stores context information that is used as attachement for the internal read and write handlers
Handler enum Enumerates possible types of completion handlers
Response enum Enumerates the possible responses from SSLEngineAutomat
SSLAsynchronousChannelGroup public class See below
SSLAsynchronousSocketChannel public class See below
SSLAsynchronousSocketChannelLayer public class Layer for SSL/TLS processing
SSLAsynchronousSocketChannelImpl public class Implements public abstract methods of class SSLAsynchronousSocketChannel
SSLEngineAutomat class Evaluates stati of SSLEngineResult.Status and SSLEngineResult.HandshakeStatus and decides which action is be performed according to the status
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SSLAsynchronousChannelGroup
    A grouping of ssl asynchronous channels for the purpose of resource sharing.
    SSLAsynchronousSocketChannel
    The SSLAsynchronousSocketChannel class represents an asynchronous socket channel that supports encrypting and decrypting of data according to the SSL/TLS protocol.
